info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 5:06PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 545 PM MST... At 505 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near New River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. The hail may be strong enough to cover the ground. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, Horseshoe Reservoir and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 219 and 231. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 25 and 30. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 134 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
